## Market Concept
A clear and concise description of the prediction market idea.

## Market Type
- [ ] Binary (Yes/No outcome)
- [ ] Multiple Choice (3+ options)
- [ ] Scalar/Numeric (range of values)
- [ ] Other (please specify)

## Settlement Mechanism
How will this market be settled?
- [ ] Bitcoin block hash (provably fair)
- [ ] Oracle-based (specify oracle)
- [ ] Manual settlement
- [ ] Other (please explain)

## Market Parameters
- **Question**: What will users be predicting?
- **Resolution Date**: When will the market resolve?
- **Liquidity Requirements**: Expected minimum liquidity
- **Fee Structure**: Platform fees, settlement fees

## Technical Implementation
If you have ideas on how to implement this market:
- Clarity contract modifications needed
- Frontend components required
- Oracle integration (if applicable)
- Security considerations

## Why This Market?
Explain why this market would be valuable:
- User interest level
- Real-world impact
- Uniqueness compared to existing markets
- Potential trading volume

## Examples
Provide examples of similar markets or real-world events this could predict.

## Additional Context
Add any mockups, references, or other relevant information.
